segments.text: Hello , I am calling about my cable service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the past week my cable hasn't been working .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I apologize , but the cable has been down lately .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know when it is going to start working again ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Give it a couple days , and it should be back on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will I still have to pay for the cable while it's not working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Since it's not working , I'm going to give you a credit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So I don't have to pay anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't pay anything until your cable starts working again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , thank you very much for your help .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . Thank you for being so understanding .
segments.speaker: S2
